translations: 至上地；崇高地；极度，极其

sentences.sentence: She does her job supremely well.
They managed it all supremely well.
sentences.translation: 这件事他们干得极其出色。

sentences.sentence: Iris Murdoch was regarded by many as a supremely good and serious writer.
sentences.translation: 艾里斯·默多克被许多人认为是一位极其出色而又严肃的作家。
